short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple SQL formatter and copy tool for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SQL Formatter is a powerful and easy-to-use tool designed to help developers and data analysts clean up their SQL queries with a single click. Whether you’re working with complex queries or simple statements, this Chrome extension formats your SQL into a readable, properly indented style, ensuring clarity and making your code easier to debug or share.

Key Features:
Instant SQL Formatting: Quickly format any SQL query with a single click to enhance readability.
Copy with Ease: Easily copy formatted SQL code directly to your clipboard for use in your development environments or documentation.
Supports All SQL Types: Works with all SQL dialects, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Oracle, SQLite, and more.
Material UI: Simple and modern interface designed for efficiency and minimalism.
Built for Developers & Analysts: No more manual SQL formatting — boost your productivity by letting the extension handle the heavy lifting.
Simply paste your SQL code into the extension, hit "Format SQL," and your query will be neatly organized with proper indentation and line breaks. Save time and avoid errors when working with SQL
